title: Boris Johnson – 2020 Speech at Holocaust Memorial Day
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, on 27 January 2020.
content:
Last week Mala told me her story, including the scene that awaited Ian and our British forces when they liberated Bergen Belsen almost 75 years ago.
